title: Fresh Falafel Friday: Mediterranean Plant-Based Perfection
subtitle: Crispy, flavorful, and completely vegan - our falafel is made fresh daily

content.main: Every Friday calls for fresh falafel! Our homemade falafel is crafted from scratch daily using traditional Mediterranean recipes with chickpeas, fresh herbs, and aromatic spices.
highlights: Made fresh daily with premium chickpeas
Perfectly seasoned with parsley, cilantro, and Middle Eastern spices
Available as wrap, pita, or bowl
content.tip: Pair with our creamy tahini sauce and fresh Mediterranean salad for a complete plant-based meal!
content.cta: Perfect for Meatless Friday! Order at orderdoner.com
